channel.title: Transformer on 공대생의 알쓸신잡
channel.description: Recent content in Transformer on 공대생의 알쓸신잡

item.title: Attention Is All You Need
item.description: Attention Is All You Need NIPS 2017, cited by 839 1st Author Name & Institute : Vaswani, Google Brain Keywords Transformer Encoder & Decoder Scaled-Dot-Product Attention Multi-Head Attention Contribution WMT 2014 English-German 번역태스크에서 28.4 BLEU 스코어를 기록. English-French 번역태스크에서는 SOTA 갱신 (41.8) seq2seq의 길이제한 문제(일정길이 이상에서 oom) 해결. Proposed Architecture Dataset WMT 2014 English-German dataset Valuable Relative Works Sequence to Sequence Learning with Neural Networks 2h.
